issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I changed TitaniumSDK from 7.4.2 to 8.3.1. Then I imported the photos in the app. However, a blue question mark is displayed.(Attachment: cap_BlueQuestionMark.png) No error is displayed in the console. How can it be solved? The html of WebView looks like this {code:html}
{code}
fields.summary: A blue question mark shows up when trying to show a photo (HTML)
